sam.name: Samuel Emard-Thibault
sam.about: Hi, my name is Sam, I'm from Ottawa, and am completing my studies in Kingston, ON. I enjoy working on web applications and exploring emerging technologies such as React, Flask, and Spring Boot!
sam.about_short: Hi, my name is Sam, I'm from Ottawa, and am completing my studies in Kingston, ON.
sam.education: Rising junior studying Computer Engineering at Queen's University in ON, Canada.

work_experience.name: MLH Production Engineering Fellow
work_experience.val: Develop and deploy this web application using GitHub best practices such as PRs, code reviews, and issues.

work_experience.name: Computer Science Tutor
work_experience.val: Help High school-level students learn the fundamental concepts of the Java programming language.

work_experience.name: Queen's Racing Electrical Team Member
work_experience.val: Analyze PCB designs of electrical components and analyse MatLab SimuLink models and documentation.

sam.hobbies: working on cars, buildings computers, and playing video games.

projects.name: Hackville 2022 - TimeSavior
projects.desc: Spring Boot web application that suggests days to complete weekly tasks based on a user's schedule.

projects.name: QHACKS Hackathon, 1st place HOTG Category - CookHack
projects.desc: React.Js web application that suggests recipes to cook based on a user's available ingredients.

projects.name: Personal Project - MongoWheels
projects.desc: Spring Boot web application with a MongoDB database which allows users to access automobile data.

projects.name: NewHacks 2021, 3rd place overall - NoteHack
projects.desc: Note-sharing application that allows students to share their electronic notes.
